name: stable-diffusion
description: Generate images from text with Latent Diffusion LAION-400M

inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.description: try adding increments to your prompt such as 'oil on canvas', 'a painting', 'a book cover'

inputs.label: Number of Images
inputs.description: How many images you wish to generate

inputs.label: Steps
inputs.description: More steps can increase quality but will take longer to generate

inputs.label: Guidance scale
inputs.description: How closely we should follow the prompt
